title: Postgame Show: Transition
description:
We begin the Postgame Show with all the details on the Josh Primo story in San Antonio and what's been underreported thus far. Amin, Dan, and Hawk discuss Primo, Ime Udoka, and where ethical lines are drawn in an effort to win. Then, after a smooth transition, JuJu Gotti gets us prepared for him and Tony to take over New York for UFC 281 before reaching into his bag of gifts for the Shipping Container.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
